EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.Intelligent.Services.N.G.N.18224.TBC (Nurture 2).Email 2A /3B
EmailTemplate.subject: Save time and money on ONT activation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Talk to our experts Accelerate time-to-revenue and reduce ONT activation costs
We all know that deploying fiber can be costly. That’s why we’ve devised the most cost-efficient deployment services <[[https://networks.nokia.com/intelligent-access/services]]> that also generate revenue more quickly. The key is to accelerate ONT activation.
Book a meeting today with one of our services experts to discuss how we can help you radically improve ONT installation and activation. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
